ayas.translation: By the Fig and the Olive,

ayas.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
ayas.translation: We have indeed created man in the best of moulds,
Then do We abase him (to be) the lowest of the low,-

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
ayas.translation: Except such as believe and do righteous deeds: For they shall have a reward unfailing.
ayas.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti falahum ajrun ghayru mamnūn

ayas.translation: Then what can, after this, contradict thee, as to the judgment (to come)?
Is not Allah the wisest of judges?
